translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator
The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Are Open - Canopies Refurbished (Update)

The University Park canopy refurbishing project is complete. Passengers have full access to the east and west station and parking lot platform entrances. Metra appreciates your patience throughout the project.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED Homewood Elevator is Back in Service
The Homewood elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 17 through Sunday, January 18. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Train 2601 is Delayed
MDN  train #2601 scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 10:12 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to track construction. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

The Van Buren Station Elevator is out of service
The Van Buren Station elevator will remain out of service until Saturday, January 17. Customers can use the South Water elevator, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
